creator: rnyairo
title: Set up wifi on your edison
description: This project guides you through setting up a WiFi connection on your Intel Edison board using a serial terminal.
steps: Connect your Edison to your computer via a serial terminal program like PuTTY.
Log in to the Edison through the serial terminal.
Type the command `configure_edison --wifi` to initiate the WiFi setup.
The Edison will scan and display a list of available WiFi networks.
Select the desired network by entering its corresponding number.
Enter the password for the selected WiFi network to connect.
